etymology.description: 木(木, "tree") corrupted to 圥 + 土(土, "soil") = kneeling person planting sapling -> 丮(丮, "to hold") evolved from 丸 -> final form 埶
etymology.interpretation: Originally, 埶 depicted a person kneeling to plant a sapling into the soil, symbolizing cultivation and art. The character illustrates the essence of art as a process of nurturing and growth.
